hints.content:
We can solve this problem in two ways:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green{6} \text{ students for soccer}\\
+& \underline{\blue{?} \text{ students for Quidditch}}\\
=&\pink{15} \text{ students on sports teams}\end{align}$

Or:

$\qquad \begin{align}&\pink{15} \text{ students on sports teams}\\
-& \underline{\green{6} \text{ students for soccer}}\\
=&\blue{?} \text{ students for Quidditch}\end{align}$

question.content:
$15$ students signed up for sports teams. $6$ signed up for soccer and the rest signed up for Quidditch.

**How many students signed up for Quidditch? ** 

[[☃ input-number 1]] students
